subdisciplines.name: Bioethics
subdisciplines.description: The study of ethical issues arising from advances in biology and medicine.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental Ethics
subdisciplines.description: The study of ethical issues arising from interactions between humans and the environment.

subdisciplines.name: Computer Ethics
subdisciplines.description: The study of ethical issues arising from the use of computers, software, and information technology.

subdisciplines.name: Legal Ethics
subdisciplines.description: The study of ethical issues arising in the legal profession.

subdisciplines.name: Business Ethics
subdisciplines.description: The study of ethical issues arising in the world of business and commerce.
